content.p: We are committed to the promotion and protection of human rights as well as the establishment and strengthening of the rule of law worldwide. As a home for leading experts in their fields, our research has supported the realisation of human rights around the globe. Our experts conduct leading research in the field of human rights and have delivered training, produced publications, and carried out capacity-building and knowledge exchange activities in collaboration with governments, intergovernmental organisations, scholars and civil society worldwide.
